results.title: The effect of simvastatin on periprosthetic bone mineral density in the hypercholesterolaemic patients after total hip arthroplasty.
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Periprosthetic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057068 @@@periprosthetic@@@ bone mineral density in the hypercholesterolaemic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ after total @DISEASE_Hip_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D025981 @@@hip arthroplasty@@@.

results.title: The effect of simvastatin on polyethylene particle-induced osteolysis.
results.text_hl: This finding suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may have a role for noninvasive prevention and treatment of wear debris-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Periprosthetic_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057068 @@@periprosthetic osteolysis@@@ after total joint arthroplasty.

citations.NLM: von Knoch F, Heckelei A, Wedemeyer C, Saxler G, Hilken G, Henschke F, Löer F, von Knoch M. The effect of simvastatin on polyethylene particle-induced osteolysis. Biomaterials. 2005 Jun;26(17):3549-55. PMID: 15621245
